name: AssurantPocketDrive
0:
”Alexa, ask pocket drive where my car is located”
”Alexa, ask pocket drive what the fuel level is in my car”
”Alexa, ask pocket drive to summarize my last trip”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: pocket drive
Developer Terms of Use
des: Interact with Assurant via your Alexa devices and get details about your vehicles and trips, like where your vehicle is located, about your vehicle's health status, about the last trip you have taken or what the fuel level is in your gas tank.
